uncheck_to_exclude_folder.message: Uncheck the folders to exclude when sorting.

weh_prefs_description_auto_sort.message: If this option is enabled, the bookmarks will be sorted when bookmarks are added, changed, moved or deleted. This means you cannot move any bookmarks in the same folder, unless it is moved over a separator.

weh_prefs_description_bookmark_sort_orde.message: Specifies the bookmark sort order. Minimum value of 1 and maximum of 2.

weh_prefs_description_case_insensitive.message: If this option is enabled, the bookmarks will be sorted without considering the letter case.

weh_prefs_description_delay.message: Specifies how long to wait (in seconds) for inactivity before sorting bookmarks. This applies to automatic and manual sorting. Minimum value of 3 and maximum of 255.

weh_prefs_description_folder_inverse.message: If this option is enabled, the order specified in 'Sort Folder By' will be reversed.

weh_prefs_description_folder_sort_by.message: Specifies a sort criteria to sort folders.

weh_prefs_description_folder_sort_order.message: Specifies the folder sort order. Minimum value of 1 and maximum of 2.

weh_prefs_description_inverse.message: if this option is enabled, the order specified in 'Sort By' will be reversed. So the order will be descending.

weh_prefs_description_sort_by.message: Specifies the first sort criteria to sort the bookmarks.

weh_prefs_description_then_inverse.message: If this option is enabled, the order specified in 'Then Sort By' will be reversed.

weh_prefs_description_then_sort_by.message: Specifies the second sort criteria to sort the bookmarks.
